KH.content: mytheme, acc. Hegel, will have been a prephilosopheme promised to a dialectical Aufhebung
KH.linkedContent: mytheme, acc. Hegel, will have been a prephilosopheme promised to a dialectical Aufhebung

GOD.content: [economy of the sacrifice] in turn toward new mystery, toward new structure of responsibility, prior one never eliminated, kept w/in oneself, mourned as crypt of a more ancient secret > is this repression, is this a kind of sacrificial Aufhebung?
GOD.linkedContent: [economy of the sacrifice] in turn toward new mystery, toward new structure of responsibility, prior one never eliminated, kept w/in oneself, mourned as crypt of a more ancient secret > is this repression, is this a kind of sacrificial Aufhebung?

LOBL.content: antagony from arrêt to arrêt, an Aufhebung that never lets up, arrêt arresting arrêt, both senses, both ways
LOBL.linkedContent: antagony from arrêt to arrêt, an Aufhebung that never lets up, arrêt arresting arrêt, both senses, both ways

EM.content: Aufheben is relever: at the same time > déplacer, élever, remplacer et promouvoir

VM.content: “alterity, difference, and time are not suppressed but retained by absolute knowledge in the form of the Aufhebung”
VM.linkedContent: “alterity, difference, and time are not suppressed but retained by absolute knowledge in the form of the Aufhebung”

VM.content: [do for all words what Hegel did for Aufhebung? no, see DS p. 200]
VM.linkedContent: [do for all words what Hegel did for Aufhebung? no, see DS p. 200]

PPHS.content: Aufhebung facilitates spirit’s elevation beyond that within which it was submerged, sublimates nature into itself > presenting itself to itself as such
PPHS.linkedContent: Aufhebung facilitates spirit’s elevation beyond that within which it was submerged, sublimates nature into itself > presenting itself to itself as such

PPHS.content: authority of voice: coordinated w/ entire Hegelian system: its archeology, teleology, eschatology, its will to parousia > process of sign is an Aufhebung, negativity
PPHS.linkedContent: authority of voice: coordinated w/ entire Hegelian system: its archeology, teleology, eschatology, its will to parousia > process of sign is an Aufhebung, negativity

PPHS.content: Hegel: negativity of intelligence, Aufhebung of sign relieves/promotes beyond natural, sensual, spatial
PPHS.linkedContent: Hegel: negativity of intelligence, Aufhebung of sign relieves/promotes beyond natural, sensual, spatial

T.content: Marges concerns relevance of limit, a reading of the Hegelian Aufhebung, a reading beyond Hegel’s own intention, beyond that which is inscribed on the internal vestibule of his ear, where Hegel’s text would be a writing machine of “conscious intention,” thus a mechanical reader
T.linkedContent: Marges concerns relevance of limit, a reading of the Hegelian Aufhebung, a reading beyond Hegel’s own intention, beyond that which is inscribed on the internal vestibule of his ear, where Hegel’s text would be a writing machine of “conscious intention,” thus a mechanical reader

F.content: otherness before opposition btwn introj./incorp. not the contradiction of telos of Aufhebung, but undecidable irresolution: paradoxically incorp. doesn’t preserve other [garde une topique, mantient sauve], introj. more open [to other] > makes it impossible for the 2 to close over their proper, their death, their corpse
F.linkedContent: otherness before opposition btwn introj./incorp. not the contradiction of telos of Aufhebung, but undecidable irresolution: paradoxically incorp. doesn’t preserve other [garde une topique, mantient sauve], introj. more open [to other] > makes it impossible for the 2 to close over their proper, their death, their corpse

DS.content: Aufhebung—most “relevant” way of (re)covering (up) graphics of supplementarity or hymen, le recouvrement le plus séduisant, because most similar > thus, must critique Aufhebung as decisive target, that which obfuscates specificity of “writing operation”
DS.linkedContent: Aufhebung—most “relevant” way of (re)covering (up) graphics of supplementarity or hymen, le recouvrement le plus séduisant, because most similar > thus, must critique Aufhebung as decisive target, that which obfuscates specificity of “writing operation”

OS.content: space becomes concrete by retaining/restoring negative w/in itself, by negating itself
OS.linkedContent: space becomes concrete by retaining/restoring negative w/in itself, by negating itself

OS.content: 1st negative determination of space is the POINT (the place that does not take place), it then negates itself in relation the LINE > als sich aufhebend, point is the line, the Being-spatial of point > then comes the PLANE (surface) > each next stage only made of the negated prior stage, i.e. line made of negated points
OS.linkedContent: 1st negative determination of space is the POINT (the place that does not take place), it then negates itself in relation the LINE > als sich aufhebend, point is the line, the Being-spatial of point > then comes the PLANE (surface) > each next stage only made of the negated prior stage, i.e. line made of negated points

OS.content: “always too late to ask the question of time” re: spatialization
OS.linkedContent: “always too late to ask the question of time” re: spatialization

OS.content: point & time thought in circularity together (Aufhebung, speculative negativity, only possible by means of infinite correlation or reflection) > time is spacing, space is time > thus for Aristotle, stigmē, punctuality, determines nowness (nun, jetzt)
OS.linkedContent: point & time thought in circularity together (Aufhebung, speculative negativity, only possible by means of infinite correlation or reflection) > time is spacing, space is time > thus for Aristotle, stigmē, punctuality, determines nowness (nun, jetzt)

OS.content: Hegel: Notion is in and for itself absolute (total) negativity and freedom
OS.linkedContent: Hegel: Notion is in and for itself absolute (total) negativity and freedom

OS.content: for Hegel, time erases time, Tilgen (to erase) is also an Aufhebung: given that time is pure exterior self, parousia is end of time
OS.linkedContent: for Hegel, time erases time, Tilgen (to erase) is also an Aufhebung: given that time is pure exterior self, parousia is end of time

POS.content: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is
POS.linkedContent: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is

POS.content: differance not Hegel’s difference of contradiction, which uses a third term to resolve, synthesize, aufheben
POS.linkedContent: differance not Hegel’s difference of contradiction, which uses a third term to resolve, synthesize, aufheben

POS.content: Houdebine says “no Aufhebung here,” Derrida responds: there is always Aufhebung, just as there is always repression, sublimation, idealization
POS.linkedContent: Houdebine says “no Aufhebung here,” Derrida responds: there is always Aufhebung, just as there is always repression, sublimation, idealization

POS.content: Derrida does not apply spacing to negate that which is ‘present,’ this would remain logic of Hegelian Aufhebung, Derrida’s nonpresence not found in opposition presence/absence
POS.linkedContent: Derrida does not apply spacing to negate that which is ‘present,’ this would remain logic of Hegelian Aufhebung, Derrida’s nonpresence not found in opposition presence/absence

ROP.content: repetition compulsion (advocatus diaboli of death drive) as resource & limit (à la fois) of psychoanalysis > analytic position set going endlessly, w/out Aufhebung, in paradox of Bindung and Erlöschung (solution, extinction): no analytic position when resistance is unidentifiable
ROP.linkedContent: repetition compulsion (advocatus diaboli of death drive) as resource & limit (à la fois) of psychoanalysis > analytic position set going endlessly, w/out Aufhebung, in paradox of Bindung and Erlöschung (solution, extinction): no analytic position when resistance is unidentifiable

DIF.content: Aufhebung constrained into writing itself otherwise, or simply into writing itself, or taking into account its consumption of writing (sa consommation d’écriture) [re: general/restricted economy]
DIF.linkedContent: Aufhebung constrained into writing itself otherwise, or simply into writing itself, or taking into account its consumption of writing (sa consommation d’écriture) [re: general/restricted economy]

O.content: differance inscribes contradictions, is the critical limit of idealizing powers of la relève (Aufgehoben), which reduces contradictions to homogeneity of single model
O.linkedContent: differance inscribes contradictions, is the critical limit of idealizing powers of la relève (Aufgehoben), which reduces contradictions to homogeneity of single model

DPi.content: Hugo’s abolitionism: disappearance of social order of past (priest, executioner, king), but order remains, what counts is what remains, the reste, of the turning, of the Christian Aufhebung ——Hugo: “cross will be substituted for the gallows”
DPi.linkedContent: Hugo’s abolitionism: disappearance of social order of past (priest, executioner, king), but order remains, what counts is what remains, the reste, of the turning, of the Christian Aufhebung ——Hugo: “cross will be substituted for the gallows”

DPi.content: the logic of Aufhebung’s remainder & fact that Christianity, unlike Judaism/Islam, is also an immanentist humanism (mediation of God made man) > brings Camus’ atheistic abolitionism closest to Hugo’s Christological transcendence
DPi.linkedContent: the logic of Aufhebung’s remainder & fact that Christianity, unlike Judaism/Islam, is also an immanentist humanism (mediation of God made man) > brings Camus’ atheistic abolitionism closest to Hugo’s Christological transcendence

RGE.content: conservation of Aufhebung: circulation & self-reproduction as reproduction of meaning
RGE.linkedContent: conservation of Aufhebung: circulation & self-reproduction as reproduction of meaning

RGE.content: Aufhebung amortizes absolute expenditure (la dépense absolue), works the “putting at stake” into an investment (à élaborer la mise en jeu en investissement) > it’s laughable
RGE.linkedContent: Aufhebung amortizes absolute expenditure (la dépense absolue), works the “putting at stake” into an investment (à élaborer la mise en jeu en investissement) > it’s laughable

RGE.content: acc. Bataille, to be indifferent to comedy of Aufhebung (like Hegel was)—to blind oneself to experience of sacred, to heedless sacrifice of presence & meaning
RGE.linkedContent: acc. Bataille, to be indifferent to comedy of Aufhebung (like Hegel was)—to blind oneself to experience of sacred, to heedless sacrifice of presence & meaning

RGE.content: Aufhebung: produced entirely w/in system/work of signification, from one infinite determination to the next, each one conserved in the other, transitions produced by anxiety of infinity—included w/in circle of absolute knowledge, never suspends totality of discourse (work, meaning, law), never exceeds its closure > restricted economy, circulation of prohibitions: history as truth of prohibitions
RGE.linkedContent: Aufhebung: produced entirely w/in system/work of signification, from one infinite determination to the next, each one conserved in the other, transitions produced by anxiety of infinity—included w/in circle of absolute knowledge, never suspends totality of discourse (work, meaning, law), never exceeds its closure > restricted economy, circulation of prohibitions: history as truth of prohibitions

RGE.content: laughter’s burst does not maintain itself (not negative), laughs at Aufhebung
RGE.linkedContent: laughter’s burst does not maintain itself (not negative), laughs at Aufhebung

REST.content: to “put aside (mettre de côté)” once bizarre, but here interesting translation of Aufheben [re: Heidegger putting Van Gogh picture aside]
REST.linkedContent: to “put aside (mettre de côté)” once bizarre, but here interesting translation of Aufheben [re: Heidegger putting Van Gogh picture aside]

ATAP.content: via Kant, apocalypse as dream of raising (aufheben) veil of Isis
ATAP.linkedContent: via Kant, apocalypse as dream of raising (aufheben) veil of Isis

SPEC.content: Bindung inaugurates, assures, overflows PP (mastery), as seat of its condition
SPEC.linkedContent: Bindung inaugurates, assures, overflows PP (mastery), as seat of its condition

SPEC.content: no relève of PP—not Hegelian [since PP always master?] > in fact, function of PP, (postal) binding, determines interpretation of Aufhebung
SPEC.linkedContent: no relève of PP—not Hegelian [since PP always master?] > in fact, function of PP, (postal) binding, determines interpretation of Aufhebung

FV.content: systemic & historical link btwn idealization, relève (Aufhebung), and the voice > Lacan’s elevation of signifier
FV.linkedContent: systemic & historical link btwn idealization, relève (Aufhebung), and the voice > Lacan’s elevation of signifier

FV.content: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”
FV.linkedContent: Lacan: “the phallus is the signifier of this Aufhebung itself, which it inaugurates (initiates) by its disappearance”

FV.content: Lacan reversed Hegel: not ideal signified but ideal signifier
